channel.title: audit on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in audit on Today I Learned

item.description: that sudo can be configured with the visudo command and that sudo can produce audit logs. See https://www.sudo.ws/posts/2022/05/sudo-for-blue-teams-how-to-control-and-log-better/ that there’s an Element.closest(selector) method, which means you can run this function to set the url to the closest link to an element: ((el) => { let id = el.closest("[id]")?.id; if (!id) return; else location.hash = id; })($0); that you can use SELECT /*...*/ FROM one_table JOIN other_table USING (common_column) as shorthand for one_table.
